member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.RoutesController.GetRoute(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the route with the specified identifier, if it exists.
member.returns: The route with the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.RoutesController.CreateRoute(Application.Routes.Commands.CreateRoute.CreateRouteRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new route based on the specified request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created route.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AddressesController.GetAddress(System.Guid,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Gets the address with the specified identifier, if it exists.
member.returns: The address with the specified identifier, if it exists.

member.name: M:Presentation.Controllers.AddressesController.CreateAddress(Application.Addresses.Commands.CreateAddress.CreateAddressRequest,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Creates a new address based on the specified request.
member.returns: The identifier of the newly created address.
